PERSONA:
meet david, a 68-year-old married man living in a non-metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. he is a white, non-hispanic citizen who was born in the u.s. and has lived here his entire life.

david holds a postgraduate degree and has had a successful career, earning an upper-income family income of $100,000 or more. despite his affluence, he maintains a moderate political ideology and considers himself an independent voter, though he leans towards the democratic party.

religiously, david identifies as jewish and attends religious services a few times a year. he is deeply rooted in his faith and cultural traditions, which play a significant role in his life.

in his free time, david enjoys volunteering and giving back to his community. he is an avid internet user, spending several times a day online, likely staying up-to-date with news, pursuing his interests, or connecting with loved ones.

david is a well-rounded individual with a diverse set of experiences and perspectives. he values education, community involvement, and maintaining a balanced outlook on life. with his moderate political views and deep cultural roots, he represents the diversity and complexity of the american experience.
